title: SCOWL Premiere New Video for "Fantasy" Alongside The Release of New Album, Are We All Angels – Band Also Due to Perform on the Late Show with Stephen Colbert
description: SCOWL are next on the list of bands to perform on late night television. The post SCOWL Premiere New Video for "Fantasy" Alongside The Release of New Album, Are We All Angels – Band Also Due to Perform on the Late Show with Stephen Colbert appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: SCOWL are next on the list of bands to perform on late night television.
text: Friday, the 4th of April, saw the release of SCOWL's highly anticipated second studio record, Are We All Angels via Dead Oceans. Having received rave reviews from publications like Disorted Magazine, Kerrang! and Variety, the record sees the hardcore band branching into more shoegaze-y sounds. In celebration of the album's release, the band premiered a brand new music video for the track, "Fantasy." Check it out below. html:
Friday, the 4th of April, saw the release of SCOWL's highly anticipated second studio record, Are We All Angels via Dead Oceans. Having received rave reviews from publications like Disorted Magazine, Kerrang! and Variety, the record sees the hardcore band branching into more shoegaze-y sounds.

In celebration of the album's release, the band premiered a brand new music video for the track, "Fantasy." Check it out below.

And, in honour of the release, the band are due to perform on the Late Show with Stephen Colbert on Wednesday, April 9th.

You can now listen SCOWL's Are We All Angels record here.
